<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oracular Warning](/Feats.aspx?ID=6056) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=800" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=579" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 138 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You are about to roll for initiative.

</column>

---

You have a premonition about impending danger that you use to warn your allies. Each ally within 20 feet gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll and gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, which last for 1 minute. If you are [cursebound](/Traits.aspx?ID=800) 2 when you use Oracular Warning, the bonus increases to +3, and if you are cursebound 3, the bonus increases to +4.
name: Oracular Warning
